name: test_npm_deno
description: Test npm deno package to produce .bin/exe files

scripts.start: npx deno eval "console.log('begin'); Deno.writeTextFile('./fight.txt', 'KO!'); console.log('finish him'); console.log('...flawless execution of example');" -- --allow-write
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:posix || npm run cleanup:win32

author: TamusJRoyce
